user.title: Set up the CS:GO game state listener
user.description: Are you sure you want to set up the CS:GO game state listener webhook?

abort.one_instance_allowed: Only a single instance is necessary.
abort.not_internet_accessible: Your Home Assistant instance needs to be accessible from the internet to receive messages from CS:GO.

create_entry.default:
To send events to Home Assistant, you will need to setup the game state integration on your CS:GO client or server.

Fill in the following info:

"uri" "{webhook_url}"
- Method: POST

See [the documentation]({docs_url}) for further details.
